name: Escape the Void (Croubble)
description:
A short, simple Sokoban game. 

Arrow keys to move, Z to undo, R to reset.

Although the game is designed to be completed without hints, a full Youtube walkthrough can be found here for accessibility purposes:  Walkthrough

Puzzlescript hosting for those who prefer to play direct through Puzzlescript Link
